nodes.bodyText: Does it make sense to use conditional @configuration instead?
There will be multiple implementations, at least one depends on the existing class. I guess the conditions will be too difficult.
You don't need to suppress it when you name your constant with URL instead of `PATH'.
You are right, it is done now
Shouldn't you set some default value to make sure that it is not null or empty? Can you obtain it from Zowe installation so it does not have to be configured manually?
fixed with a default value of ZSS.
I am lazy to check the code myself so I am just asking. Is it protected by HTTPS? I somehow thought there are multiple RestTemplate beans.
I think at this stage, http or https depends on the type of endpoint that will serve the API. Not on the consumer. I think it can stay like this until further refinement is needed.
